Address.label: Address
Address.value: 777 EAST WISCONSIN AVENUE, MILWAUKEE, Wisconsin, 53202-5304, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sensient Technologies Corp manufactures and markets natural and synthetic colors, flavors, and flavor extracts. The company has a widespread network of facilities around the globe, and its customers operate across a variety of end markets. Sensient's offerings are predominantly applied to consumer-facing products, including food and beverage, cosmetics and pharmaceuticals. The company's three reportable segments were the Flavors & Extracts Group and the Color Group and, Asia Pacific Group.
